product_name: Brooks Playground Jacket II - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Brooks Playground Jacket II combines warm, weather-resistant insulation with fun style to escort you through your workout in comfort. Windproof, water-resistant, glossy polyester shell on the core fends off light rain, and 40g synthetic core insulation offers lightweight warmth. Stretchy and breathable sleeves, shoulders and side panels offer high mobility and wick moisture away from skin to keep you warm and dry. Thumbholes secure sleeves over hands for warmth. Moisture-proof pocket protects your phone or media player. Subtle embroidered cloud-burst stitch detail along the sides offers an extra touch of style. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility. Semifitted Brooks Playground jacket II is not too loose and not too tight. Closeout.
short_description: The Brooks Playground Jacket II combines warm, weather-resistant insulation with fun style to escort you through your workout in comfort.
